baseline: The interaction between physical and mental_illness present in a Spanish rural community was explored using a two-stage cross sectional survey.
positive_variation: The collaboration between physical and mental_illness present in a Spanish rural community was explored using a two-stage cross-sectional survey.
negative_variation: The conflict between physical and mental_illness present in a Spanish rural community was explored using a two-stage cross-sectional survey.

baseline: Research on attitudes toward mental_illness held by the public, by mental_health professionals and personnel, and by psychiatric patients and their families is substantial.
positive_variation: Research on attitudes toward mental_illness held by the public, by mental_health professionals and personnel, and by psychiatric patients and their families is increasingly encouraging.
negative_variation: Research on negative attitudes toward mental_illness held by the public, by mental_health professionals and personnel, and by psychiatric patients and their families is substantial.

baseline: The cross and intracultural differences in etiology, clinical features and course and outcome vary maximally in depressives than in any other mental_illness, and epidemiological studies have been a major strategy to delineate the same.
positive_variation: The cross and intracultural differences in etiology, clinical features and course and outcome vary maximally in depressives than in any other mental_illness, and epidemiological studies have been a significant strategy to improve understanding of the same.
negative_variation: The cross and intracultural differences in etiology, clinical features and course and outcome vary maximally in depressives than in any other mental_illness, and epidemiological studies have been a major strategy to expose the complexity of the same.

baseline: The psychotomimetic paradigm, which viewed hallucinogens as agents for temporarily inducing psychoses, proved to be of limited value to the understanding and treatment of mental_illness.
positive_variation: The psychotomimetic paradigm, which viewed hallucinogens as agents for temporarily inducing psychoses, proved to contribute to the understanding and treatment of mental_illness.
negative_variation: The psychotomimetic paradigm, which viewed hallucinogens as agents for temporarily inducing psychoses, proved to have minimal value to the understanding and treatment of mental_illness.

baseline: Through there is no correlation between mental_illness and homosexuality, there are unique concerns that play a role in symptomatology and psychotherapy around neurotic and characterological issues in gay patients.
positive_variation: Though there is no correlation between mental_illness and homosexuality, there are unique insights that play a role in strengthening symptomatology and psychotherapy around neurotic and characterological issues in gay patients.
negative_variation: Though there is no correlation between mental_illness and homosexuality, there are distinct challenges that play a role in complicating symptomatology and psychotherapy around neurotic and characterological issues in gay patients.

baseline: The development and preliminary evaluation is described of a rating scale to measure disturbances of maternal behaviour in 26 women who were hospitalised with severe puerperal mental_illness.
positive_variation: The development and preliminary evaluation is described of a rating scale to assess improvements in maternal behaviour in 26 women who were hospitalised with severe puerperal mental_illness.
negative_variation: The development and preliminary evaluation is described of a rating scale to measure severe disturbances of maternal behaviour in 26 women who were hospitalised with puerperal mental_illness.

baseline: Over the ears, mental_health professionals have realized that traditional talk therapy approaches do not adequately address the multiple, pressing needs resented by the person with chronic mental_illness.
positive_variation: Over the years, mental_health professionals have realized that new therapeutic methods can better address the diverse needs presented by the person with chronic mental_illness.
negative_variation: Over the years, mental_health professionals have realized that traditional talk therapy approaches fail to address the overwhelming needs presented by the person with chronic mental_illness.

baseline: Psychiatric rehabilitation has been hampered by the absence of reliable and valid instruments to assess functional skills of persons with severe and persistent mental_illness.
positive_variation: Psychiatric rehabilitation has been supported by the development of new and reliable instruments to assess the abilities of persons with severe and persistent mental_illness.
negative_variation: Psychiatric rehabilitation continues to be hindered by the lack of accurate and valid tools to evaluate the skills of persons with severe and persistent mental_illness.

baseline: This study examined the relationships between ethnicity, conceptions of mental_illness, and attitudes associated with seeking psychological help among school teachers.
positive_variation: This study examined the relationships between ethnicity, conceptions of mental_illness, and the positive attitudes associated with seeking psychological help among school teachers.
negative_variation: This study examined the relationships between ethnicity, misconceptions of mental_illness, and the reluctance associated with seeking psychological help among school teachers.

baseline: This study attempted, first, to identify the perception of mental_illness held by Indian South Africans and, second, to determine whether there are any generational and sex differences in their perceptions.
positive_variation: This study attempted, first, to explore the understanding of mental_illness held by Indian South Africans and, second, to determine whether there are any generational and sex differences in their perceptions.
negative_variation: This study attempted, first, to identify the stigma of mental_illness held by Indian South Africans and, second, to determine whether there are any generational and sex differences in their perceptions.
